mapper.insert: insert into web_board (num, title, writer, filename, content, b_date) values (NUM_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{filename},#{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update web_board set TITLE=#{title}, FILENAME=#{filename}, CONTENT=#{content} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: Select num, title, writer, b_date From web_board ORDER BY NUM DESC
